mapper.select:
SELECT t.code ,t.repay_biz_code ,t.case_number ,t.plaintiff ,t.defendant ,t.case_subject ,t.case_car ,t.case_fee ,t.case_start_datetime ,t.case_status ,t.case_pdf ,t.pay_amount_prove ,t.acceptance_time ,t.court_datetime ,t.court_address ,t.handle_judge ,t.hear_case_number ,t.judge_datetime ,t.judge_result ,t.judge_pdf ,t.judge_pdf_delivery_time ,t.effective_time ,t.exe_case_number ,t.exe_apply_user ,t.execute_mark_amount ,t.exe_datetime ,t.exe_result ,t.sale_datetime ,t.exe_pdf ,t.status ,t.updater ,t.update_datetime FROM tdh_judge t
t.${order}
